Author: synedchdochee
Text: I always cross-reference with the scale at the gym if I move my scale at all. It gives peace of mind know that they show the same weight. I do look like a crazy person going to the gym just to weigh myself and then immediately leaving sometimes haha.

Author: livelotus
Text: Move it around like 10 more times and pick the spot that has the average number. You may have just moved it to a bad spot.
